# This file should be included when you package your plugin.
# Mandatory items:

[general]
name=Spectral Libraries Tool
qgisMinimumVersion=3.4
description=Spectral Library Creation and Optimization
version=0.0.1
author=Benjamin Jakimow (HU Berlin); Ann Crabb√© (KU Leuven)
email=ann.crabbe@kuleuven.be

about=The Spectral Library Tool software package provides a suite of processing tools for multi- and hyperspectral
 spectral libraries: library creation (from import or image) and optimization (IES, EAR-MASA-COB, CRES).

tracker=https://bitbucket.org/kul-reseco/spectral-libraries/issues
repository=https://bitbucket.org/kul-reseco/spectral-libraries/src
# End of mandatory metadata

# Recommended items:

# Uncomment the following line and add your changelog:
changelog=https://spectral-libraries.readthedocs.io

# Tags are comma separated with spaces allowed
tags=ies, ear, masa, cob, emc, cres, square array, spectral library, remote sensing

homepage=https://spectral-libraries.readthedocs.io
category=Raster
icon=images/lumos_h60.png
# experimental flag
experimental=False

# deprecated flag (applies to the whole plugin, not just a single version)
deprecated=False
